contextId.information: These are both ways to refer to what God has said to the prophets. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])

These two phrases mean basically the same thing and refer to one animal. The second phrase clarifies that this is a young donkey. AT: "on a young donkey." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: on a donkey, on the colt of a donkey
